inclusion.criterion: Neck, shoulder or spine pain for at least 12 weeks
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Continuous headache may be chronic daily headache or tension headache
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: The attacks come 2 times or more per week and each episode lasts around a day or a half.

inclusion.criterion: Patients having the willing to undergo the treatment
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Patients undergoing physical another therapy treatment in cervical or head areas.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patient with degenerative neurological syndrome or fibromyalgia
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Patients undergo any neck, head or shoulder surgical process
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: The patient is a 15 year old girl with the history of recurrent bilateral headache. She recently noticed that there are more attacks around her menstrual period.
